title: Brushfire: A perfect solution to Hillsong's small to large scale event's ticketing and registrations
name: Robert B.
pros: Pros: I have been responsible for our large event's ticketing and registrations for a number of years as well as the technology and information areas for Hillsong Church. Two years ago, after meeting with the world's best ticketing platforms and providers and coming to the realisation that they could not support our specific requirements as a church requiring complexity and depth in our registrations, we decided to build our own software. However, we understood the gravity of the decision to develop such a system and weren't excited about the journey ahead. I was introduced to Brushfire Technology and their ticketing and registration platform. After a very short time and no upfront costs, Brushfire's solution had proven itself as the perfect solution for our needs, with their unique understanding of industry standards around software development and the nature of the church, we had found our answer. This allowed our conferences and events to move forward and our technology department concentrates on other issues.

title: Best ticketing service available
name: Patti C.
pros: Pros: I can monitor orders, agents and release seats from ANYWHERE at ANY TIME, including opening the balcony seating from my phone 200 miles away during a homecoming football event. It is flexible to include seating choices, dinners and other add-ons, and promotional codes. It is easy to create revenue reports and monitor volunteer agents who handle money. We scan tickets at the door from tickets, e-tickets, and smart phones. It also has e-Blast capabilities to communicate with patrons.
cons: Cons: It doesn't automatically show orders as fulfilled when you print. You have to mark the will call orders as you print.
overall: Overall: Easy monitoring of entire system. This is especially important when using volunteers to take in money. It is web based and can be used or monitored from any computer or phone and offers multiple payment and delivery options. You can "see" which agents have placed orders. I also like the availability the patrons have to email me directly if there is a problem. The map and directions are also helpful.

title: Next level platform!
name: juliette b.
pros: Pros: I like the organization & variety of it all. It's not just a template site, but you can make it customized in how you want it with ease. I like the daily notification of sign-ups, automatic welcome email, and all the back end details that the software provides. Also, when registrants sign up, they can login back in and track their payments and amount owed.
cons: Cons: It's very overwhelming because there are a lot of moving parts & options I didn't know about because it's very complex. However, that is solved by customer service call.
overall: Overall: Setting up an account on Brushfire is a life saver. Initially, I had problems with keeping all of my data organized, sending out emails and keeping track of registrants. However, through the help with my amazing customer agent, I was able to accomplish a successful set up with a professional and organized site. He even made me aware of options that I was not even aware of. I would say that the customer service was my highlight, as I felt that he was directly with my team. He literally set up calls with me until everything was working smoothly and to my complete liking. He was the most patient person I've worked with that wasn't directly tied to my ministry. He truly took on the care of ensuring a thorough set up as if it was his own. I truly value my whole experience!

title: Brushfire Software
name: Lori M.
pros: Pros: We use Brushfire for ticketing for a number of events every year. The software is easy to set up and use. The fees are more reasonable than some other options that we looked at. It's very customizable to different events, different venues and different prices or add-on's within an event. We have utilized the coupon codes for special offers and I the reports are helpful for tracking income, attendees and for making settlement on shows that are based on doors sales or percentages of door sales. We also use the Brushfire app to "check in" people to an event, using mobile phones or ipads.
cons: Cons: It would be helpful for the email confirmations you receive to include the event name along with the event number.

title: Working with Brushfire has been a great experience! I love the product and the team behind it.
name: Lindsey B.
pros: Pros: I love the reporting module! It is very user-friendly compared to some other reporting software that I have used. I also appreciate the ability to customize event set up for the needs of our organization. I think we do some wild things sometimes that Brushfire handles well and I have even had cases where the team changed the software to function better for our needs. Brushfire has LOTS features and helpful tools! Sometimes I feel as though we have just scratched the surface.
cons: Cons: The many features Brushfire offers came with quite a learning curve for me (BUT, BF team is always quick to help me out!). It took me about 6 months to feel like a savvy admin. That being said though, I feel as though our organization does some intense things with ticketing that may add an element of complexity. :)
overall: Overall: Better registration experience for our customers and organization for our team!

title: We use this for payments of special event tickets and ongoing donations & student deposits
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very versatile - ticket registrations, payments, easy to refund, downloads into excel. Love the ease of reporting & use.
cons: Cons: Only one email can be set up to receive the alerts & immediate payments for each event. This isn't a big concern for myself but we have so many different departments using the software it is more complex for us because there are so many users. Love it though. Anyone can log in and find their own reports so this isn't a major con.
overall: Overall: Flexible registrations and ease of reports. Ease of refunds.

title: I absolutely love Brushfire. The system is super easy to use and understand.
name: Jonathan K.
pros: Pros: I love the flexibility and all the options for setting up attendee registrations and event data. It makes things so easy.
cons: Cons: The promo code system is a little bit constraining. I would like to be able to set a number to limit code uses. currently the date option to limit codes is good for most situations but this would be the main thing I would like fixed.
overall: Overall: I have benefitted by reducing the time it takes for me to accomplish my tasks and updating registration information. I also save so much time with the reporting system.

title: We love Brushfire. They feel like family.
name: Hannah E.
pros: Pros: Customer service and adaptability are my favorite things about this software. Thank you for all you do to customize it.
cons: Cons: Pulling reports feels confusing and hard. We had a hard time figuring out how many tickets were meal tickets versus tickets. Also, when I need data it's just hard to know which report presents it best. However, I'm not sure there is a better way. I just think it's sort of the way of the data reporting world.

title: Brushfire has been such an incredible company to work with for all of our events!
name: Rachel K.
pros: Pros: We are able to customize all of our events in a way that best suit us! We have had many different types of events with different seating maps and locations and Brushfire has been such a big help as we explore new and better ways to plan for our events!
cons: Cons: There are only a few minor things that have been an issue such as the inability to take certain options (like access codes) off of the page. It has been confused multiple times for promo codes.
overall: Overall: It is very helpful for us with all of the different events that we do! The call center is SO helpful and the team is so helpful and amazing to work with :)

title: Brushfire has all of the qualities of a great software!
name: Valerie S.
pros: Pros: Great reports for our staff to give updates and great accounting reports!Customer Service has a fast response time! Brushfire is easy to use and to make changes.
cons: Cons: Some visual designs for our customers are a little cumbersome - maybe less "clean" and simple than we would like, but overall very functional.
overall: Overall: Offering more options to our customers with making online purchases. Also the ease of reporting for accounting purposes is excellent.

title: Next level features and service!
name: Liv G.
pros: Pros: Brushfire took what was many complex processes for our team and were able to simplify them into an admin/user-friendly and flexible setup. We are able to adjust and manipulate events and data as required and the web-based nature of this software makes it accessible anywhere (including your phone!). The Brushfire team are outstanding in their commitment to our organisation winning and moving forward at every stage of the process and provide continual support especially when implementing new features or developing function areas.

title: Support is a great quality!
name: Natalie H.
pros: Pros: We have had some very complicated events and they have walked me through each event with ease. Pulling reports is easy. Re-creating recurring events is great.
cons: Cons: Attaching documents to emails would be a nice feature. I know that we can do a link to a document but some things would be nice as an attachment.
overall: Overall: Keeping track of attendees and campers and able to reports very quickly

title: Brushfire has made managing three distinct events - very easy and very organized.
name: Russ L.
position: Director: Gateway Conference & Blessed Life TV
pros: Pros: The fast customer service response, the clarity, ease and logic of working within the software to design your reg and reporting needs.
overall: Overall: The ease of managing three distinct events with very different registration needs. Brushfire met the complex need with an easy, user-friendly solution.

title: Brushfire has made all my event management needs extremely simple!
name: Kim M.
pros: Pros: The Brushfire support team is extremely helpful and quick to respond. It has also helped increase ticket sales and is very easy to use. Very reasonably priced for the services offered.
overall: Overall: Increased ticket sales and excellent event management capabilities.

title: Great!
name: Bobbie M.
pros: Pros: Ease of user usage! Getting events set up has also been great. We enjoy that there are several customizable options.
cons: Cons: Security rights are not specific enough. We would like select which users have specific financial rights.

title: Friendly. Allowed customization and always willing to work with us on new ideas or features.
name: Chandler B.
pros: Pros: Customization. Easy to get a hold of for problems. Love the staff. Great for multiple types of events.
cons: Cons: The aesthetics. I wish it was cleaner and maybe more modern feeling. Sometimes feels a little outdated.

title: Best people to work with; simple to learn program
name: Debi S.
pros: Pros: Very easy to learn and I'm NOT a computer person. I learn as I go! Every time we use it there are upgrades that improve the process but it is still a simple process to learn and pass on to other users. I love being able to find customer/purchase info. Many ministries use Brushfire on our campus and seem very happy with it.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the process seems slow because of the many pages. We typically have a crowd of people to serve at one time so it would be great if it wasn't such a long process.
overall: Overall: We are able to encourage our congregation to purchase online which helps alleviate the crowd situation.

title: I love brushfire and the people behind the software, its been a helpful tool to help me do ministry.
name: Rachel B.
pros: Pros: I like that the software has customization to it that allows you to modify things so easily and quickly. It is a great tool to bring clear communication to your attendees pre during and post an event. The report features and tracking from years past is helpful. I've used many registration softwares and brushfire has hands down always been my favorite.
cons: Cons: The one thing that as a new user that I didn't like much was how many things you have to click on to get somewhere. And that there is a lot of ways you can get to the same thing. It was a lot before I knew how to get around.

title: Awesom, easy, and perfectly suited to our needs!
name: Brent D.
pros: Pros: The system, process, and support are second to none. We sold 25,000 tickets with ease. Will never use anyone or anything else.
cons: Cons: A small learning curve for new users, however, tech support is available and goes above and beyond.
overall: Overall: We used to do ticket sales on our own or through a local company - Brushfire is so much more professional, easy, and brings results.

title: Great service
name: Jan C.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, very flexible to accommodate almost any event
overall: Overall: Brushfire staff are always very helpful. We often have to implement an event with short notice. They respond in a timely manner and always come through for us.

title: Exemplary service since 2005/2006
name: Tommie B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Appealing and clear presentation. Service support is EXCEPTIONAL.
cons: Cons: Nothing comes to mind.
overall: Overall: Our experience with this online ticketing service has been fantastic in every aspect. We have used this service every year for our major Christmas productions (2-3 shows). Response time to any requests for additional support or customization for our event needs is always immediate. They are exceptional in every way and we will continue to use this service for all our online ticketing needs, and will continue to encourage others in our organization to do so. Impossible to imagine another ticketing company providing the quality of product and service that Brushfire does.

title: Very helpful in navigating our specific needs for an event.
name: Christine C.
pros: Pros: I like that is has capabilities beyond just tickets like email, a database, customizable fields. I like that we can set up a customized form for people to fill out for our specific events. It is really nice to have the scanning technology for checking people in!
cons: Cons: It would be helpful to have a record of which emails were sent (like a distribution report) to verify the email addresses.
overall: Overall: Ease and convenience! It's nice to have all the information in one spot and where we can email those who have registered.

title: Perfect solution for our needs!
name: Chris T.
pros: Pros: Immediate customer service! Every question is resolved within minutes. We love the support from Brushfire.

title: I've used Brushfire several times to manage large events with different moving dynamics.
name: Katherine H.
pros: Pros: The versatility and functionality of the software are unparalleled in the event field! You can make it do almost anything that you want. I've managed volunteers, multiple breakout groups, lunches, everything pertaining to my event through Brushfire - AND it allows me to pull data and reports on all of those functions. I've never seen anything like it. The support team and customer service have always been so prompt and helpful that I literally can't complain.
overall: Overall: This software has been invaluable in managing attendance and all aspects of our events. The major benefits have been reporting, tracking attendance and financials, sending communication to attendees, etc.

title: Outstanding Technical Support
name: Garrett R.
pros: Pros: The team at Brushfire is incredibly responsive (and always has been). My organization has worked with them several times in the past, but recently my team needed some intense customization done for a project and the Brushfire team knocked it out of the park. We needed their help and they came through. Can't say enough about their development team or their company...you need Brushfire in your corner!
cons: Cons: There is nothing to dislike. Read on, reader.

title: Easy to use, does everything we need to manage our theatre events
name: Ruth L.
pros: Pros: I am the parent volunteer running the box office for our high school's School of the Arts. We produce events large and small. It is easy to set up events, promotional codes, ticket types -- everything we need. Reporting is great. Most importantly, the support provided by the BF team is absolutely excellent. If I send a question in, they respond promptly! I'm an IT professional for my "day job" -- I wish all of my vendors worked like Brushfire does!
cons: Cons: It took a bit to learn all of the functionality, but even that was made easy by the excellent online help.

title: Ticketing for our events used to be a major stresser, Brushfire is the answer to relieve the stress
name: Rob L.
pros: Pros: The is all inclusive from start to finish and takes care of your ticketing needs from the beginning of the process all the way to check in
cons: Cons: the mobile experience needs to be a little more user-friendly as well as it would be nice to be able to see what is available in the diagram you send (make the diagram dynamic).
overall: Overall: we have the ticketing process completely taken care of and do not have to worry about it for our events that require tickets

title: Great support and streamlined processes
name: Cristy O.
pros: Pros: The program is easily adaptable and very user friendly, they really have thought of everything!The support team were very accessible and prompt with replies.
cons: Cons: Having to use a payment gateway, it is an added cost and another step in the reconciliation process.
overall: Overall: Streamlined registration process, easy access to information.

title: Brushfire has the best customer service team I've ever encountered. Ever.
name: Amanda G.
pros: Pros: I like that it's user friendly--I can easily make changes that are updated immediately, and I don't have to wait for someone to do some HTML magic behind the scenes.
cons: Cons: I think the only con I can think of is all my software doesn't work as well as Brushfire.
overall: Overall: It makes registering people for events so easy. Plus, I can capture all the data I want (in order to take over the world mwhahahahaha! Just kidding, but really).

title: We have used Brushfire for events for a while, and it is very easy to use, and the support is great!
name: Tiffany B.
pros: Pros: The customer service at Brushfire is top notch. They answer your questions very quickly! Great people to work with!
cons: Cons: Finding where information is located can be confusing at times. You can find what you need, but you have to sometimes keep clicking items until you get there.
overall: Overall: This was a ticketing system that is easy to use and very cost-efficient. We can set up an event very quickly.

title: We use this software fairly regularly for concerts and events
name: Lori M.
pros: Pros: Simple to use for selling tickets, reporting options are good. Learning curve is easy even for those who are not computer people.
cons: Cons: The return/exchange interface is kind of clunky. It would also it seems like we used to be able to click multiple seats to add to cart rather then having to add them one at a time but made that is a set up issue and not a software issue.

title: Awesome
name: Joshua S.
pros: Pros: Love it the best product we use I love everything about it. Do not change anything. Don't waste your time it's awesome!

title: Literally the best ever!
name: Crisman W.
pros: Pros: The customer service and the price is the best! I am always able to speedy response with a clear answer!
cons: Cons: I dont like that I had to sign up for a different payment gateway than we already had. I would rather just link my regular PayPal instead of having to use Stripe

title: We have enjoyed working with Brushfire for the past few years
name: Mindy V.
pros: Pros: The site has a clear interface; we like the options of choose your own seats or best available; the site is easy to use; prompt and friendly customer service.
cons: Cons: Tickets are held in the cart for up to 30 minutes. This may be convenient for some, but holds seats "hostage" that may not end up being purchased.
overall: Overall: Ease in ticket sales for our annual show

title: We love Brushfire's customer service, and report features, interface isn't the easiest for customers
name: Christina L.
pros: Pros: Customer Service, seat map ability, exporting reports is super easy, tracking promotional code usage
cons: Cons: Using Promo codes isn't that easy and gets confused with access code for customers, which results in a lot of phone calls/ emails. Also it would be great if access code would take you right to which seats they actually open instead of still having to know the section and click on it after you've entered the access code.
overall: Overall: We used this for our women's conference in the Dolby for 3 yrs in a row and will be using it for our 4th year.

title: We love brushfire. Its been a good overall tool for our needs.
name: Lance O.
pros: Pros: The ability to copy events! This makes our jobs so much easier -- and saves us valuable time when we do the same events YOY.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the layout of content and where to make edits is confusing. There might be a more intuitive layout option.
overall: Overall: Easy of use, saves us time and money.

title: Worth it!
name: Sheree C.
pros: Pros: We have the ability to edit tickets, issue refunds and change information. The best advantage of the software is that attendants have the capability to resend misplaced tickets, change names and forward tickets as gifts.
cons: Cons: When we used the service we did not have the ability to utilize the app for registration. Recently, BF change things! We can now utilize the app for registration.
overall: Overall: The customer service is what sets BF a part from other software programs. Our organization had lots of questions during the set-up/registration process. Each one of our questions was answered in a timely fashion. The customer service is the number one reason we chose BF!

title: We've been using Brushfire for 6 years and I've never considered going anywhere else.
name: Sherry R.
pros: Pros: The software is very user-friendly and I was able to jump right in and use it with little training. We are a volunteer non-profit and it's been very easy to train others to sell tickets.
cons: Cons: I hate to mention this as a negative because I have not asked the Brushfire team, but I'm hoping there is a credit card swiping option. We usually just manually enter credit cards, but that process tends to be a little slow when you have a line of customers.
overall: Overall: This software enables us to cost-effectively sell tickets to our shows while utilizing minimal staff.

title: Brushfire has made the online registration process so easy!
name: David M.
pros: Pros: They are so quick to do anything you need. They even help you understand the whole process and all they can do for you.
cons: Cons: If I have to import the data to put into a document it is a little time consuming but that is very minor.
overall: Overall: It helps me with the different events I need registration. Both large and small.

title: I am using Brushfire for the ministry that I work and It is easy to use
name: Cassandra V.
pros: Pros: That is easy to customize each event. Also that the price is very good in comparation with Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: The Spanish translations is weak and incorrect for many concepts. This is causing confusion on our attendees.

title: So easy to use and easy to issue refunds and manage details
name: Matthew B.
pros: Pros: We have appreciated using Brushfire for concerts, large recitals and other events. It has allowed a streamlined process to manage guests. On the rare refund times it is such a simple process our volunteers can do it very quickly keeping customer service complaints from being an issue.
cons: Cons: We haven't had any issues with the software at all. It meets all our needs and the customer service has been great. Highly recommend!

title: I used Brushfire for a few large events that I was coordinating (conferences, seminars).
name: Justin W.
pros: Pros: It accomplished everything that I needed it to do to get people registered as individuals, and also as larger groups with different discounts and levels of registration.
cons: Cons: I wish I had more control over establishing groups and details about registration without going through Brushfire's support team. However, their team always emailed me back very quickly and did everything I asked.
overall: Overall: Great registration format for my events.

title: Brushfire makes event planning and ticket sales so much easier for those of us wearing many hats!
name: Karen J.
pros: Pros: Brushfire provides a seating chart so people can select their seats. It gives a very professional appearance to our event - as it should be! They are very helpful and quick to respond to any questions or requests that we have.
overall: Overall: Tracking ticket sales.

title: Great Value, Customer Service, and Technology. I'd highly recommend Brushfire.
name: Tommie A.
pros: Pros: We love the ease and highly customizable software. It's very easy to use and post new events. The staff is very quick to respond and helpful.
cons: Cons: Since we have two groups under the same account, the billing details can be a bit muddy. Also, the defaults reports always include all the events. It would be nice to not have to 'de-select' all the events all the time.
overall: Overall: online vs. paper/mail in registrations ... no brainer!

title: I have great confidence in the Brushfire team!
name: Annie A.
pros: Pros: Table reservations and reports that can be generated and manipulated for different purposes are the feature I like best.
cons: Cons: Sometimes errors can't be corrected as I experienced this year - a previous year photo continues to pop up - confusing people.

title: I love using Brushfire for all of our events! They are super great to work with and very quick!
name: Stephanie W.
pros: Pros: I love that the Customer Service is so fast to help! They are always willing to do whatever it takes to make our event page great!
cons: Cons: The button for customers to print our their ticket could be a little bigger. I think that some people miss it.

title: The personal care displayed by the team is amazing!
name: Jamie F.
pros: Pros: Love the ease of use! There are so many reports that allow for great functionality and marketing opportunity !
cons: Cons: The website can tend to run a little slow. The reports are great, they can just take a while to load... and slows the site down.

title: Customer service IT are so quick and helpful. The front end interface is simple yet effective
name: Jessica B.
pros: Pros: Scanning function for front end and salesFlexibility to add questions and gather information desired.Customer service is fast and very helpful
cons: Cons: Limited integration into F1 and prior to updates caused issues on database end. Integrating payment function with registration is a struggle.
overall: Overall: Speeds up check in process, makes data input more effective and streamlined

title: Very easy to use and robust system/program.
name: Young Y.
pros: Pros: Versatile options for running our event registration and ticketing. I like how the customer support is also very friendly and actually helpful (compared to many other companies).
cons: Cons: The UI looks outdated and bleak and not as "modern". Some of the functionalities of it were tricky to navigate and maneuver through from the get go. Perhaps the UI and easy navigation go hand-in-hand?

title: Excellent Customer Service!
name: Beth C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love the ease of use and the quick and easy accessibility of the customer service department if there are any issues!
cons: Cons: I can't really say there are any cons.
overall: Overall: Brushfire has been incredible! It is our first time to use a website like this, so we had many questions... Brushfire has been quick to answer them all. They have the BEST customer service I have seen in a really long time! I am so grateful for them! They have been a godsend for this conference and have been the easiest of all companies to deal with! Thanks so much Brushfire!

title: Customer support responded via email very quickly and with clarity
name: Vicki C.
pros: Pros: User friendly for the people signing up for the event and the help in the software itself is very useful for such a complete program
cons: Cons: Can't always find the reports we need easily and the directions to get help within the software are sometime not easy to find.
overall: Overall: Great Graphics and it is easy for those signing up for an event to do so.

title: Excellent program
name: Judy H.
pros: Pros: It is very easy to program and easy for users that register with the program. I love all the features and ways you can customize your program.

title: Speed of service
name: walter R.
pros: Pros: How quickly a registration page can be created
cons: Cons: Nothing wrong. Everything was great. great product
overall: Overall: Managing the details of the attendees has become way easier and labor saving

title: We use Brushfire for our conferences and small events in Europe
name: Marina P.
pros: Pros: It`s very clear and user-friendly, the communication with the support team is always efficient and fast; the correlation of value and costs are extraordinary, the only one in the market. there are no other equivalent in the market as far as we see
cons: Cons: it`s difficult to name the features we don`t like; may be we would like to see some more features for bigger international events with various means of payment
overall: Overall: Efficient communication, reasonable prices and friendly service

title: Very good!
name: Tarra O.
pros: Pros: Custom features are really great. The best that we have used. Love the ease of web access. The support offered is very good.
cons: Cons: Pricing is too high when you have mulitiple events every year it gets very expensive. Would love to have a discount for multiple events .

title: Great event tool
name: Phil D.
pros: Pros: It has so many options and features. It gives you quite a bit of flexibility in how you can use it. Great value for the $
cons: Cons: You cannot do everything on your own, it takes some work back and forth with the company to get things setup. A cleaner user interface would make this better.

title: amazing software, user friendly and excellent customer service!
name: Samantha K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: - Very customizable (for example: plug and play reports, multiple registration paths etc.)- User friendly for customers- Option to add customer call centre- Fees are very reasonable - do not have to pay for free registrations
cons: Cons: - Limited options for e-marketing- App is not developed yet- Does not have the ability to automate waitlists

title: Brushfire has been very user friendly!
name: Britni G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The responsiveness of the staff to help us execute our registration vision! We love that everyone is eager to help us create the best platform for our registration.
cons: Cons: This is not anyone's fault but it's been hard to have a time difference as when we might message something urgent at the end of our day (west coast) we don't hear back until the following. Uncontrollable.

title: Brushfire has made our ticketing process real easy with full integration into our existing website.
name: Tim P.
pros: Pros: The backend is real powerful with a bunch of customizations, options, and reporting. The end user experience is our biggest positive as we had little to no complaints or problems with over 2000 tickets sold... It is easy and quick which is big. The tickets are emailed as a PDF and was customized to the event and looked very professional. Customer Support is very quick and helped with any issues we had.
cons: Cons: Even though there are plenty of customizations available on the back end, it does not seem as user friendly especially on the ticket design and page layout. We would like to be able to create events instantly without interaction with the staff and wish there was more payment gateway options.

title: Great company! They value their customers and have championed he best bang for your buck.
name: Zeb S.
pros: Pros: The flexibility of the organization, customer service is easy to get a hold of. The ability to add additional users with different permissions.
cons: Cons: The user experience could be improved. The interface has room be more modern, intuitive, and simple.

title: BRUSHFIRE I'm a Blaze
name: JAMIE B.
pros: Pros: such a great platform and easy to use. love this software I've booked many events using it from church conferences to seminars
cons: Cons: when i have used it, as much as i love it, i haven't been able to re-direct to the "host" main website by clicking the logo. ex. registering for a conference and then wanting to go to the host organizations main website i have to open a new tab.

title: A solid option for event management!
name: Brandon S.
pros: Pros: Brushfire does what you would expect - making event registration and management a breeze. Being a part of a large church organization, Brushfire is tailored to help make our conferences and events go smoothly.
cons: Cons: There are some minor usability issues, such as understanding what an "Area" is, and how to edit the headers of events. Otherwise, a solid product.
overall: Overall: It's been helpful ever since we switched to Brushfire! I would recommend this to any medium to large church for simple event registration.

title: My experience has beeen great so far. Love the functionality of Brushfire.
name: Michael P.
pros: Pros: Functionality, ability to customize to my specific preferences for each ticket type has Beene huge. Also the ability to customize the content to add videos and our own images for various devices is great.
cons: Cons: Can't group fields together so I could delete or duplicate sections.
overall: Overall: Sales for our events is the biggest benefit. Plus the ability to capture user info.

title: It worked fine for online registration.
name: Jan E.
pros: Pros: What I like most that the checks came in once a month. It worked well for those that like online registering.
cons: Cons: What I liked least about your product was that it charged a $5 transaction fee to every person and little ability to have people pay on site with cash. Not everyone can afford camps and your program made it that much harder for them
overall: Overall: Allowing us to have online registering.

title: Been a very productive pleasant and efficient experience! I love the platform.
name: Karen M.
pros: Pros: The look and overfeel of the site is amazing! I love the customization. The platform is easy to navigate.
overall: Overall: Saved me an incredible amount of time.

title: Easy to use, great customer service!
name: Don C.
pros: Pros: Brushfire is a full service event software that is easy to use and has flexible features to customize to your specific event needs.
cons: Cons: We'd love to see more integration with other web platforms we utilize. The accounting and reporting side could be enhanced.

title: Brushfire is there for your event
name: David M.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: Brushfire has all the major features of event registration, helping to promote and track and event and keep it all very simple! Every major church uses them it seems like. They also have an awesome tiered pricing plan to help keep up with any size of event.
cons: Cons: Nothing, Brushfire rocks and I think is here to stay and continue giving great updates and innovations!

title: We have throughly enjoyed using Brushfire for our church events and registrations this past year.
name: Katrina B.
pros: Pros: Your customer Support is my favorite thing about your company! Hands down! It has been so helpful knowing you can contact someone 24/7 to help!
cons: Cons: Running reports can be a bit cumbersome but having great customer support to set them up for you is so helpful
overall: Overall: This year we used it for online registration for an ongoing weekly event. It has made our book keeping easier and streamlined our paper process.

title: Fantastic Event Ticketing
name: Steve P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The customizability and ease of use. This is the best ticketing system I have found. Not only does the technology work, but the customer service is 5 star. For more complex events, they are quick to help and do so with professionalism and great attitudes.
cons: Cons: I would like to see more integration with church management systems (ChMS) so sales and attendance data can be connected to members in our ChMS database.
overall: Overall: Makes setting up events super easy and provides a fantastic experience for the customer purchasing the ticket.

title: Great ticketing service!
name: Michelle W.
comments: Comments: We have been using Brushfire for over 2 years to manage our events ticketing. I have been very pleased working with the Brushfire staff. They have been helpful in strategizing the format for our various venue ticketing needs, setting up reports, assisting customers, etc. They are always willing to help in any way they can with a timely turnaround. Thank you, Brushfire!

title: Excellent Company and Customer Service
name: Lexie G.
comments: Comments: I highly recommend Brushfire to anyone looking to streamline their event and have their turn out be as successful as possible. Brushfire's functions are very user-friendly and their reporting features are extremely helpful.

title: BrushFire Review
name: Jami B.
pros: Pros: the ability to add purchases to my Apple Wallet.
cons: Cons: Some of the conferences I have attended we had issues getting all the info we needed.

title: don't know what i'd do without them
name: Beth F.
comments: Comments: my experience with Brushfire has been nothing but excellent! everyone one is friendly, they provide great customer service and is there to help us with anything that we need. the program is user friendly and is a big help to our ministries when managing their events.

title: We have used Brushfire for 5+ events, both assigned seating and open, and have been really pleased!
name: Michael E.
pros: Pros: The flexibility in the software to allow us to accomplish a myriad of goals and requirements. From promo codes for specific scenarios to access codes with assigned seating Brushfire can do it.

title: Over 10 YEARS using Brushfire! Great Experience.
name: Todd S.
pros: Pros: Ease of usage. Can track sales easily!.
overall: Overall: We've had tremendous success using Brushfire for our event software. Easy to work with and responsive to our needs in a timely manner. I would highly recommend Brushfire for your event.

title: A must have if selling and organizing tickets to an event.
name: Josh S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Brushfire allows you to have an event and then sell tickets and then keep all of that information organized for the event.
cons: Cons: All great things come with a cost. For Brushfire you have to weight if the event is going to be successful. If you are able to charge enough per ticket for them to get their cut then this is a great investment towards your event.
overall: Overall: If you need to keep an event organized and sell tickets or seats then Brushfire is an excellent option. You can keep on top of sales and communication to create an environment of success for your event.

title: Like the app and the ease of use for events. Creating the events is not as easy.
name: Stephen W.
pros: Pros: Mobile check in and ability to add tickets to apple wallet. Love the social functionality for sharing events.
cons: Cons: Cost. Eats too much of our costs for events. Difficult to set up graphics and the printed tickets for events.

title: Very functional and easy to use
name: Chuck C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The systems is very Flexibility and easy to use. There has been time in which that I had had to reach out for assistance and the staff has been very helpful.

title: Mostly frustrating
name: Kimberly B.
pros: Pros: We are happy to have an online home for our events, but were not satisfied with the way the software worked
cons: Cons: Difficult to use and find the options needed. And found it hard to pull the reports and track the things we need.

title: Mostly frustrating
name: Emma N.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
